nodes.name: Relic Hunter
nodes.summary: A new custom class—the Relic Hunter—comes with skills tailored to tomb exploration and artifact recovery. Over 90 ancestral tombs now feature unique urns that trigger guardian encounters for added immersion. Over 30 quests to retrieve

nodes.name: Seams and Schemes
nodes.summary: A quest mod set in Mournhold’s bustling Great Bazaar, where the noble rivalry of two demanding clients turns a simple errand into a web of high society schemes.

nodes.name: What The Heart Kneads
nodes.summary: What The Heart Kneads introduces a nuanced romance, centered around Tarys, a Dunmer Flourwright who runs Suran’s Amberloaf Bakery. Through meaningful interactions, mini-quests, and a faction-based relationship system, players can build a

nodes.name: Dralas Legacy - The Blade of Woe
nodes.summary: A quest mod and tomb overhaul that uncovers the fate of a Dark Brotherhood artifact: the Blade of Woe.

nodes.name: Hat and Hide - Adventures in Rhymes
nodes.summary: Meet Shuri-Viir, an eccentric Argonian jester with a talent for illusion, destruction, and rhyme! This quested companion will accompany you on your travels, offering witty verses, helpful advice, daily gifts, and even training—all while

nodes.name: Arcane Implements - Cantrips Spellbooks and Runes
nodes.summary: Learn Cantrips from scrolls, spells from spellbooks and summon things from Oblivion with Daedric Runes.

nodes.name: It Takes One to Know One - A perk mod
nodes.summary: - Faction members will acknowledge your rank within the faction and grant you a perk unique to the faction.- Faction members of sufficient rank will acknowledge your skill in the faction's favoured skills and grant a perk for the skill (50

nodes.name: The Bittersweet Tale of Lunaari
nodes.summary: Discover Lunaari, a young Khajiit hidden away in a Bitter Coast cave. Share gifts of tea, paintings, and ingredients to help her explore the world outside her cave while learning about her story.

nodes.name: The Lucky Fellow
nodes.summary: Discover the story of the lucky fellow in Seyda Neen as told by its inhabitants.

nodes.name: Visions - A Mysticism quest mod
nodes.summary: Those skilled in Mysticism (40+) may be granted visions while exploring the mainland. (Tamriel Rebuilt)

nodes.name: Creatures and Critters
nodes.summary: A mod crafted to harmonize diverse creature additions from great classicsSpawns make each region more uniqueLoot tables redone for variety and cohesion

nodes.name: Advent Calendar 2024
nodes.summary: Travel to Uncle Sweetshare's cabin on December 1st to collect a gift.Rinse and repeat until December 24th for a unique gift

nodes.name: Halls Of Colossus
nodes.summary: Journey through time and space as you uncover the secrets of the ancient Halls of Colossus. Guarded by the Emperor's elite, this enigmatic location is your portal to an epic tale of mystery and intrigue.

nodes.name: Animated Morrowind - Danae's Edits
nodes.summary: Fixes and Tweaks as well as edits for compatibility for Animated Morrowind - Merged, which it replaces

nodes.name: Ivy Pelagiad
nodes.summary: This mod replaces the buildings (common and Nord) in Pelagiad with a different texture, giving Pelagiad a slightly more vibrant look, befitting the Ascadian Isles.

nodes.name: Izi-inspired Caldera
nodes.summary: Adds platforms and ladders/stairs to buildings in Caldera without editing vanilla buildings or landscape.

nodes.name: Less Epic Dagon Fel
nodes.summary: It's Mikeandike's Epic Dagon Fel... trimmed down and highly compatible with other mods

nodes.name: Westly Race Bundle
nodes.summary: A bundle of race mods by Westly

nodes.name: Westlys Master Head Pack Prim and Proper
nodes.summary: This is Westly's Master Head Pack minus the least lore-friendly hair and faces.There's an optional replacer as well.

nodes.name: The Mysterious Affair of Sara Shenk
nodes.summary: In the quaint town of Caldera, the innkeeper, Shenk, becomes the centre of attention: the once-idyllic life of innkeeper Shenk takes a dark turn when his wife vanishes without a trace, leaving behind a trail of speculation and intrigue.

nodes.name: Ashlander Silt Skiff
nodes.summary: Ashu-awa, an Ashlander hunter, undertakes a regular journey between Suran and Pelagiad on her trusty Silt Skiff, selling the spoils of her hunts and the potions and crafted items she has to offer. Her journey commences in Suran, where she

nodes.name: Galen's Quest for Truth
nodes.summary: A hermit on an island east of Vivec.Befriend him and help him uncover the truth.Or not.

nodes.name: Restful Reef Refuge
nodes.summary: A quaint underwater home with plenty of storage in the Sea of Ghosts.

nodes.name: Friends and Frens
nodes.summary: A large companion mod with 30+ brand new NPC companions, 40+ vanilla/TR npcs as companions and 20+ creature companions, and quests that connects them.

nodes.name: Rishajiit - A Companion Quest Mod
nodes.summary: A voiced companion with quests, dungeons, new gear and unlockable features.

nodes.name: Wares Ultimate
nodes.summary: Modular versions of WARES

nodes.name: Sails and Sales
nodes.summary: Become the captain of your own ship, recruit crew members and acquire cargo to sell.At long last, you may sail the Seas or row on the lakes and rivers!

nodes.name: The Warehouse - Wares-aware mod collection
nodes.summary: Armour, Clothing, Weapon and Item mod integrated into Wares

nodes.name: Danaes DRIP Depot
nodes.summary: Adds DRIP integration to 40+ mods

nodes.name: Imperial Stables
nodes.summary: Adds stables where you can leave your pets, and possibly sleep if you are really broke to all Imperial settlements.

nodes.name: Divine Providence
nodes.summary: Choose a deity/saint by reading Variety of Faith, receive blessings as you level up

nodes.name: Waresifier
nodes.summary: A web-based tool that adds Wares lists to your plugins.

nodes.name: Bitter Coast Houseboat
nodes.summary: Adds a cozy houseboat in the Bitter Coast near Aleft with cloud storage and Ashfall compatibility.

nodes.name: The Astrologer and the Nightsky
nodes.summary: The Astrologer class has a unique power: Divination.The Nightsky birthsign's effects change every month.

nodes.name: Panoplies - Helluva Ways to Suit Up
nodes.summary: A large collection of Armor

nodes.name: Written in the Stars - a birthsign mod
nodes.summary: Each birthsign now has a few variants (including the original one) for a grand total of 40 new lore-friendly birthsigns.

nodes.name: Ahead of the Classes
nodes.summary: 100+ classes (vanilla, NPC classes, TR classes, new classes) that get a specific set of items and/or spells and powers as well as MWSE skill buffs. specifically tailored to your class. Loadouts include vanilla, TR, OAAB, and, depending on

nodes.name: Way of the Necromancer Redux
nodes.summary: A simple way to create undead minions if you have the right ingredients.

nodes.name: Indie Gear
nodes.summary: Simply adds a whip, a hat and a pistol to the corpse of Indiana Jones in Omalen Ancestra Tomb.

nodes.name: M'Aiq Overhaul -  Liar yes - Idiot no
nodes.summary: M'Aiq's island is now habitable. M'Aiq has many new truths to reveal. M'Aiq is a fully-fledged Friends & Frens companion.

nodes.name: Walkers of Morrowind
nodes.summary: Allows npcs in the wilderness who were given an AIWander package to actually wander within their cell.

nodes.name: Imperial Factions
nodes.summary: An overhaul of the Mages Guild, Thieves Guild and Fighters Guild

nodes.name: Lucky Loot
nodes.summary: Greater luck may grant you better loot

nodes.name: Bob's Armories for Wares
nodes.summary: Adds a lot of clothing and armour for the ladies, some for men as well as a few weapons.

nodes.name: Stuporstar's Books for Wares
nodes.summary: Adds many lore-friendly and even usegul books to your game

nodes.name: Enhanced Economics for Wares
nodes.summary: Adds many new items to the game

nodes.name: TealPanda's Mods for Wares
nodes.summary: Adds tones of plain items and some enchanted ones too. Adds new apparatus to brew new types of potions

nodes.name: Surfracers
nodes.summary: Adds Surfracers to the game

nodes.name: Hilgya the Seamstress for Wares
nodes.summary: Brings all of Hilgya the Seamstress to Wares

nodes.name: Aoimevelho's Mods for Wares
nodes.summary: A merge of 5 clothing and armour mods by Aoimevelho using Wares to distribute items

nodes.name: Korana's Mods for Wares
nodes.summary: Korana's clothes, weapons, armour and miscellanious items for Wares, without conflicts

nodes.name: Westly's Mods for Wares
nodes.summary: Makes Westly's wonderful mods Wares-aware (+ a few fixes and balance)

nodes.name: The Assassin's Arsenal
nodes.summary: You will find many exotic weapons such as sais, claws and blades as well as their off-hand counterparts.

nodes.name: Aleanne's Mods for Wares
nodes.summary: Adds Aleanne's clothing and armour as well as Pekka's matching shields

nodes.name: Silaria's Clothes for Wares
nodes.summary: Adds many clothing items to the game

nodes.name: Vaernis' Armour and Shields
nodes.summary: Three sets of Armour: Dark steel, Light Steel and Dwemer.

nodes.name: Killing Spree Helluva ways to kill
nodes.summary: This mod adds close to 500 weapons to the game, either via levelled lists or hand-placed (unique weapons)

nodes.name: Mass Cure
nodes.summary: The Imperial and Tribunal Shrine's blessings will also cure your companions.

nodes.name: ModJam Trophy Hunt 2021
nodes.summary: The 2021 ModJam Trophy Hunt Competition, Sponsored by Merlord™Find as many trophies as possible before April 10th.

nodes.name: Taddeus' Foods of Tamriel
nodes.summary: This mod adds Ashfall compatible Foods from all over Tamriel as well as a few shops and Food Outposts.It also adds ovens that can be used to bake bread and pies. More baking recipes are available if you have a rolling pin.A very

nodes.name: Equipment Variants
nodes.summary: Randomly replace stock armour and weapons on npcs and in containers with TR variants.

nodes.name: Friends and Foes
nodes.summary: Adds friendly and less friendly npcs to the game.

nodes.name: Pimp My Shrine - The Daedric Legend of Vernaccus
nodes.summary: A lore-friendly quest mod based on an in-game book brought to life, with dungeons, mind-bending puzzles, quests, Daedra, and the power to summon items from oblivion.

nodes.name: Morrowind Stats
nodes.summary: Adds a book that keeps tracks of various statistics about your character.

nodes.name: Unidentified Items
nodes.summary: Adds unidentified rings, amulets, belts, robes, pants and shirts to the game, as well as an Identify Service  from Enchanters.200+ trait, some 30 undesirable ones.Thousands of possible items with one or two traitsPlayers skilled in

nodes.name: Booze for Purists
nodes.summary: Inns always offer drinks made from local plants, usually have a few of Vvardenfell beverages and might have a couple of imports from all over Tamriel.Some plain bottles have a % chance of being replaced by common booze (MCM)Npcs (including

nodes.name: Shinies
nodes.summary: Gemstones, glass shards, and runestones.Perfect for the avid alchemist but, the miner hoping to strike gold, and the apprentice conjurer.

nodes.name: Peaceful Races
nodes.summary: Ash and corprus creatures are pacified while you are afflicted with Corprus disease.If you are playing an undead, daedric or corprus race, creatures of the same type won't attack you.

nodes.name: Failed Incarnates Pilgrimage
nodes.summary: Once you are a Clanfriend, speak to a Wise Woman to stat the pilgrimage.

nodes.name: Daedric Intervention Spell
nodes.summary: After completing any of the Daedric Princes' quest, you are granted the Daedric Intervention spell.

nodes.name: Chameleon
nodes.summary: The weid transparency of models (clothes, hair) with alpha channels issue fixed: Your character is not transparent at all

nodes.name: Dartboards Expanded
nodes.summary: Adds dartboards to a few inns across Vvardenfell.

nodes.name: Peaceful Pets
nodes.summary: Pacifies pets (Tribunal and mod-added) that are not meant to fight.

nodes.name: Class Abilities - Danae's Edits
nodes.summary: As you start the game, talk to a guard to collect your possessions and powers/spells based on a profession you choose (it can be the same as your class, or not). As you level up, you will get to pick a few new abilities.

nodes.name: Hircine's Quest
nodes.summary: Participate in the challenge of Hircine and hunt down his three aspects.

nodes.name: H.E.L.L.U.V.A armours only
nodes.summary: see changelogs

nodes.name: Ajira's Alchemy Reports Randomised
nodes.summary: Look for Ajira's stolen reports once again: their location changes every time.

nodes.name: Starfire's npc Additions - Danae's Edits and Fixes
nodes.summary: This mod adds many npcs to town as well as pilgrims and travelling merchants on the road. Known issues fixed and more options available

nodes.name: Cannibals of Morrowind - Updated
nodes.summary: A simple update and rebalance of Cannibals of Morrowind: traders won't sell their body parts anymore, nor can you make a fortune casually selling brains, more skulls to collect, updated graphics. You're welcome.

nodes.name: Ebonheart Underworks
nodes.summary: Ebonheart now has its own sewage system. With filth, rats, people and quests.
